title: Tensions as cops dismantle ‘GotaGoGama’ Galle tent
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A tense situation arose on Sunday (17) morning when Police attempted to remove the temporary structure set up in the Galle Town in support of the Occupy Galle Face Protest in Colombo.
Food and water for protestors was accumulated at the structure which was removed by the Police.
